Looking To Take Your Business Further?

We build the websites, apps, and digital solutions that solve your real business problems and help you grow.

Helping You Grow Online

We build the technology your business needs - websites, apps, systems, whatever solves your problems and helps you grow.

Complete Digital Foundation

We build the foundation for how your business shows up online - everything working together, nothing fighting against each other. Your design, messaging, and tools all moving in the same direction.

Websites & Apps Built Right

We build custom websites and web applications that solve real business problems. Complex backends, seamless integrations, whatever technical challenges you're facing - we handle the complicated stuff so your business can run smoothly.

Design That Works

Clean, professional design that lets your business shine through. We want your customers to understand what you do and feel confident working with you.


Content That Actually Helps

Your website should answer questions, not create them. We write copy that explains what you do clearly and helps visitors understand why they should care.

AI That Makes Sense

AI doesn't have to be complicated or expensive. We can help you figure out if chatbots, automated workflows, or other tools would actually help your day-to-day operations without adding unnecessary complexity.

Help You Get Found

Good SEO and smart advertising aren't magic - they're about understanding your customers and showing up when they're looking. We'll help you figure out what actually works for your business.

Meet the Team

Some of the people behind Union Web Solutions

Luc Dumas

Luc is an experienced software engineer who builds custom web applications and business systems. He's worked with education companies managing system upgrades during acquisitions, developing new features, and creating user-friendly interfaces. He handles both the technical infrastructure and customer-facing parts of applications, focusing on tools that make businesses run more efficiently - whether that's scheduling systems, customer databases, or mobile-friendly websites.

John Conlon

John has experience building and maintaining complex web applications for financial services companies. He specializes in the robust systems that handle critical financial operations - from payment processing to account management platforms. He's skilled at both technical backend infrastructure and user-facing applications, focusing on building reliable, secure systems that financial institutions depend on daily.
